issue.title: [R] expect_as_vector implementation causes test failure on R <= 3.3  and variables defined outside of test_that break build when no arrow install
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-12508](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12508). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
See <https://github.com/ursacomputing/crossbow/runs/2407283789> for details; it only causes issues for R 3.3 but not later versions, and a quick search implies that it's to do with the use of `ifelse`.  Also bug in tests when running on builds with no Arrow install.
